info.name: Crowdin Translation Highlighter
info.description:
This style modifies the outline of the translation strings on the translation platform Crowdin to emphasize/highlight them. It helps to quickly see the status (untranslated, translated, approved or hidden/not found) of the translations.

Use and enjoy it! :)
info.additionalInfo: IMPORTANT NOTE Since not all Crowdin translation pages use a sub-domain of crowdin.com, the styles need to be global. Hence please edit the style after importing it to apply only to specific pages. CHANGELOG v1.0 (2016-04-08) First Public Release
